title: Correction to: Does Passive Sampling Accurately Reflect the Bee (Apoidea: Anthophila) Communities Pollinating Apple and Sour Cherry Orchards?
content: This is a correction to: Jason Gibbs, Neelendra K. Joshi, Julianna K. Wilson, Nikki L. Rothwell, Karen Powers, Mike Haas, Larry Gut, David J. Biddinger, Rufus Isaacs, Does Passive Sampling Accurately Reflect the Bee (Apoidea: Anthophila) Communities Pollinating Apple and Sour Cherry Orchards?, Environmental Entomology, Volume 46, Issue 3, June 2017, Pages 579â€“588, https://doi.org/10.1093/ee/nvx069
